title: Stage Lv8-C1-S02
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: So determined was she that nothing could stop her.
Such was the impact that everyone remembered it.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 그녀가 너무나 결심이 굳어서 아무것도 그녀를 막을 수 없었습니다.
sentences.en: So determined was she that nothing could stop her.

sentences.kr: 그 충격이 워낙 컸던지라 모든 사람이 기억하고 있습니다.
sentences.en: Such was the impact that everyone remembered it.
Barely had we arrived when the meeting started.

sentences.kr: 그 소식이 너무나 놀라워서 말문이 막혔습니다.
sentences.en: So surprising was the news that we were speechless.

sentences.kr: 그의 재능이 워낙 뛰어나서 모든 사람이 감탄했습니다.
sentences.en: Such was his talent that everyone admired him.

sentences.kr: 간신히 문제를 해결했더니 새로운 도전이 기다리고 있었습니다.
sentences.en: Hardly had we solved the problem when a new challenge awaited.

sentences.kr: 그 상황이 너무나 복잡해서 아무도 이해할 수 없었습니다.
sentences.en: So complex was the situation that nobody could understand it.

sentences.kr: 그의 헌신이 워낙 깊어서 모든 사람이 존경했습니다.
sentences.en: Such was his dedication that everyone respected him.
